prodNameC: 瑞達篩檢EB-病毒-EBNA IgG檢驗試劑（未滅菌）
ingredientsDesc:
Plate：	12 microwell strips（can be divided）in the strip holder, coated with EBNA-1
SeroPP：Sample buffer, phosphate-buffered NaCI solution；coloured yellow；contains 0.01% thimerosal and 0.05% tween 20
SeroWP：Wash buffer, 10-fold concentrate；tris-buffered NaCI solusion；contains 0.2% bronidox-L and 0.5% tween 20
Control IgG＋：Standard control IgG, diluted human serum；coloured green；contains 0.01% thimerosal and 0.05% tween 20
Control IgG-：Negative control IgG, diluted human serum；contains 0.01% thimerosal and 0.05% tween 20 
SeroG LD：Anti-human IgG conjugate（goat）, peroxidase conjugated antibodies in stabilised protein solution；contains 10 ppm proclin, 0.01 % methylisothiazolinone, 0.01 % bromonitrodioxane. 
SeroSC：Substrate；H2O2/tetramethylbenzidine
SeroStop：Stop reagent0.5 M sulphuric acid
applicantAddr: 台北市內湖區瑞光路188巷48號8樓
efficacy: 一種半定量的酵素免疫分析法檢測人血清中是否存在鼻咽癌病毒(EBV)的EBNA誘發的IgG。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: AN DER NEUEN BERGSTRABE 17, D-64297 DARMSTADT, GERMANY
